headline: Darjeeling Tops Agoda's List of Most Searched Domestic Destinations in North-East for Oct-Dec 2025
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda has revealed its latest insights into domestic travel interest to India's North-East. Darjeeling (West Bengal) emerging as the most searched destination in the region on Agoda for the period of October to December 2025. The picturesque hill station, Gangtok (Sikkim) in second, and Shillong (Meghalaya) in third, together form the top trio of destinations in the region, drawing travellers with their scenic beauty and unique cultural experiences.
